page.title: 05St Annes - Housing
page.content: Third year pupils gathered information to assess the houses in the St Annes and Ansdell area. Information was obtained from property magazines and by surveying maps of the area The property on South Park has been built in the last 20 years.It caters for both young and old and has easy access to Lytham and St Annes.Property in Ansdell varies in age and style.The houses nearest to St Annes are more modern than those on Commonside,some of which date from the late 19th century. The biggest and most expensive property is on Clifton Drive and the Inner Promenade.These vary in age but all have many rooms and large gardens.
